attributes.action: Force universities postgrad payments to reflect the SLC loans
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.ucl.ac.uk/current-students/money/fees-support/pg-loan

How UCL want you to pay (Bad!)

http://www.mdx.ac.uk/courses/postgraduate-funding

How Middlesex want you to pay (Good)
attributes.background: Elitist Universities only allow 2 payment methods which are 100% or 50/50. This stop many working class and BAME  students from studying at postgrad. This shows how universities prefer the rich! Universities should be forced to allow a payment scheme that reflects the SLC loans so minimum 3 payments

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational decision for individual universities.
